forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 10. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 27. Wind chill values as low as 0. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the city sinks into the quiet hours of the morning, Boston rests beneath a shroud of partly cloudy tranquility, the cold air enveloping the streets with a crisp embrace. Temperatures hover at a modest low, drifting around ten degrees, while the gentle northwest wind whispers at six miles per hour, coaxing the chill ever so slightly inward. As dawn approaches, the skies will gradually give way to a mostly cloudy day, with a high reaching nearby twenty-seven. These clouds suggest a muted illumination, perhaps soothing to those who savor a softer light.

Yet, as the wind chill dips perilously close to zero, one may wish to dress with care against the biting air; layered warmth and a soft scarf will serve well against the brisk kiss of winter. This is a day that invites quiet contemplation amid the bustle: perhaps a stroll through the hushed streets, the soft crunch of heels against the frost-hardened sidewalks, or visiting an intimate café where the aroma of warm coffee mingles with the promise of a slow, reflective afternoon. Whether you find solace in the pages of a book or the comforting presence of a friend, the day carries a certain charm, albeit a cool one, perfect for finding beauty in the understated.
